column2:
Change S3 storage from Standard to Glacier to reduce cost and flexible object retrieval
Split EC2 into two types, m5a.xlarge for web server and m5a.2xlarge for application server and payment option from on-demand to spot instances
Change  RDS payment from on-demand to 1 year reserverd
